website_summaries.verdict: If you like Peanuts, you’ll like this cute hot dog toaster. Makes eating a hot dog a fun event for lunch, dinner, or snacks.
pros: Fun gadget if you like novelty items
Makes a unique gift for college students, grandparents, or anyone who enjoys hot dogs at home
Perfect for the Snoopy and Peanuts fans or collectors
Small enough to keep out, and it won’t take up much room in a cupboard
cons: Cord is in odd place in the front of the unit versus on the side

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Totally a piece of junk! Average sized buns would not fit so they could not pop up and the hot dogs were regular sized and they barely fit! I used it for the fist and only time and the buns started burning and the machine was NOT on high. Tried to push the STOP button and that did not work. Had to pull the plug to get the buns up so I could remove them. Was sorely disappointed in the item and I was truly looking forward to getting it. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: CeeVeeDee

customer_reviews.title: Conversation piece more than anything else
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband as a gift. He was excited about it, but we didn't realize what a fiasco it was to use it and clean it. The buns didn't fit in the bun toasting part (small, regular, grocery store buns) and were burned all over the inside of the toasting mechanism. Because the bun was burned all over the inside, it needed to be cleaned. We cleaned off what we could and then wrapped it back up in the box to leave on the shelf. We will never use it again and just show it off to people who ask about it sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Susie in NY

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, Functional, and Easy to Clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as a welcome home gift. I absolutely hate hot dogs and thought this would be a good way for him to enjoy them without using one of my pots or the microwave to make the house stink. It works great. It comes apart making it easy to clean and the hot dogs turn out to my husband's liking. You may have to toast the buns more than once if you are like my husband who used sour dough and pretzel rolls. Common sense, but I will say it anyways, don't use frozen hot dogs. The product looks exactly as it is pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Chef Toy

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Simple
customer_reviews.text: It serves its purpose of heating up my -sausages- well. However, I don't usually heat up the buns, so half of its capabilities are lost with me. Also, the sausages have gotten stuck before and nearly burnt; watch out for that!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was a great gift for all of the children this Christmas !
customer_reviews.text: The children were thrilled with this as their Christmas gift 🎁
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M.Samson

customer_reviews.title: fun for novelty
customer_reviews.text: fun for novelty. Takes a very long time to cook the dogs and then they are hard to get out of the toaster but otherwise it's a fun product.
customer_reviews.author: Gift Card Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost started on fire
customer_reviews.text: I Opened the box. Plugu it in to use it. And then it started smoking and almost caught on fire and black thick smoke was coming out
customer_reviews.author: Allan M.

customer_reviews.title: Fun and kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have this hot dog toaster and have a couple as gifts for the holidays. It was a hit at our gift exchange. Kid friendly too!
customer_reviews.author: Beth A Peter

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I gifted this to my friend and she loves it! She loves snoopy and hot dogs, great present for a friend with a new apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. the buns are hard to fit in but the whole thing is fun.
customer_reviews.author: Paula W. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids AND grandkids.
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids love it. And not just because it has snoopy on it.
customer_reviews.author: BILL

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: So sad, this is a disappointment. It only heats one end of the hot dog. The first time we pushed the stop button, it broke. We got three uses out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Bean Reader

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Cheap. Very cheaply made. Not a quality product at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son and husband both like it and are enjoying their hotdogs.
customer_reviews.author: Ulrike Beaty

customer_reviews.title: I enjoyed it from day one
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed it from day one , the only thing is to make sure you heat the hot dogs once and then add the buns and toast again enjoy
customer_reviews.author: lorrie

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: Looks good (depending on your decor), but more importantly, it works. It does take longer than it probably should to toast a wiener, but it's still faster than grilling one and the end result is preferable to putting one in the microwave. Doesn't seem to be very durable so I would expect that it won't be in service for multiple years.
customer_reviews.author: The Phantom

customer_reviews.title: cheap stuff and now i have to return it.
customer_reviews.text: when i got this product it didnt work plus had crumbs still on the tray.i can tell someone else returned it. im very disappoined in it.
customer_reviews.author: happy pappy

customer_reviews.title: Great for Peanuts fans.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and got to me in no time at all. My dad is a Peanuts Fanatic and absolutely loved this gift.
customer_reviews.author: David J Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Food tastes ok, not the best design, but Snoopy is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Overtime the rolls it gets harder to not burn the rolls. Overtime the little metal part that holds the hot dogs can get stuck. I burnt my thumb badly trying to quickly move it down.
customer_reviews.author: SMF

customer_reviews.title: Snoopy to the rescue
customer_reviews.text: I really like this hot dog toaster, but the bun feature burns the buns every time. I often run the hot dogs thru twice, because i like the dogs on the crisp side. It does the job, just don't leave the buns in, unless you like to recreate the charred campfire effect!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Fappas

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and easy to use. Cannot use a jumbo size hot dog. Buns can burn/smoke somewhat easy. Wish there was a setting on cooking the hot dogs like a toaster (e.g. Well done)
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So cute and cooks my hotdogs perfectly! My buns are toasted lovely too ;)
customer_reviews.author: Leigh I

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: so very cute I go this for my daughters birthday she is a snoopy fan
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Lavender

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for the fast service... this is a Christmas gift Can't wait to see it in action....
customer_reviews.author: colleen5163

customer_reviews.title: It didn't work. I was sad...
customer_reviews.text: I received the product on time like described, but the product didn't work so I returned it. :(
customer_reviews.author: Indian Girl

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made. Very unimpressed, does not work properly ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. Very unimpressed, does not work properly, the hot dog and bun lever thing do not come up properly, food burns, it has been in the basement collecting dust since.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Ashworth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I don't if it works. I give it as a birthday present. Will update.
customer_reviews.author: Samanta

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves this thinks she is a real cook.
customer_reviews.author: NELSON CARTHEN

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap fell apart when taken out of the box. Had to take it apart and fix it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: VERY DISSAPPOINTED IN THIS. DID NOT COOK THE HOTDOGS WELL AT ALL. IT WENT IN A GARAGE SALE.
customer_reviews.author: priscilla buckholz

customer_reviews.title: Peanuts hot dog maker
customer_reviews.text: Item was a gift so I personally did not use it but it looked adorable and came very quickly! Great for peanuts collectors!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Lee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: so happy we bought this even kids can use it we love it
customer_reviews.author: kelly brook

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work well. Buns get burnt and the hot dogs don't get cooked through.
customer_reviews.author: S. Joyce

customer_reviews.title: but it does work completely very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: they work as expected but i lost interests and i couldn't find a practical use for it plus the taste was bland after cooking so i just threw it away.....but it does work completely very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: E. Claveria

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic gift!! However low settings did not work for the hot dogs or buns. Make sure to put it on the higher settings - may burn them, but cooks it well and totally worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Rina Tanaka

product_meta.title: Smart Planet HDT‐1S Peanuts Snoopy Hot Dog Toaster, Red
product_meta.description: Save time, save energy and save on cleanup with this fun, functional Snoopy Hot Dog Toaster. No need to break out multiple appliances to enjoy a hot dog - this all-in-one unit makes it easy. You get slots for two hot dogs and two buns. Just set your desired toasting level, push down the lever and the dogs and buns are prepared to your specifications. With a removable crumb tray, cleanup is easy; and with a 10.45in. L x 5.5in. W x 7.85in. H footprint, it doesn't hog your countertop, either
feature_bullets: Make 2 perfectly toasted hot dogs at home in minutes
Has a removable crumb tray for easy cleanups
Just insert the buns and hot dogs; choose the desired setting and enjoy

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars88 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
